**Reasoning:**

Since you have a guaranteed buyer (John) willing to pay your minimum acceptable price ($150), there's no incentive to offer a lower price to Bob.  You might as well start at the highest point and see if Bob bites. 

**Important Note:** This assumes you have no issues with potentially losing Bob as a customer if he finds out John bought it for a lower price later.
